Class Player

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
city.cs.engine.Walker
game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, EventListener
public class Player extends city.cs.engine.Walker implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
The main controllable player. It extends Walker to enable physics-based movement and handles jumping, collisions, and state management.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Player(city.cs.engine.World world)
    Creates a new player in the given world with default settings.
